name: HTML
details: Expert in HTML5, crafting clean, semantic, and accessible markup to build responsive, SEO-optimized websites.

name: CSS
details: Proficient in CSS, SCSS, and modern frameworks like Bootstrap, delivering visually stunning and responsive user interfaces.

name: TypeScript
details: Skilled in TypeScript, leveraging static typing and OOP principles to develop scalable, maintainable, and robust web applications.

name: C++
details: Experienced in C++ programming, with a strong focus on object-oriented design, data structures, and high-performance algorithms.

name: Python
details: Proficient in Python, utilizing its versatility for automation, data analysis, and web development with popular libraries and frameworks.

name: Angular
details: Experienced in Angular, building dynamic, single-page applications with modular components, services, and efficient routing.

name: Linux
details: Highly skilled in Linux environments, proficient in system administration, scripting, and development workflows.

name: GitHub
details: Expert in GitHub, managing version control, collaborative workflows, and CI/CD pipelines for seamless project development.

name: MongoDB
details: Proficient in MongoDB, designing scalable NoSQL databases, optimizing queries, and integrating with backend services for efficient data management.

name: MySQL
details: Experienced in MySQL, designing relational database schemas, writing efficient queries, and managing large datasets for web applications.
